name: Monster Dragon
description:
Monster Dragon is a game of the genre. Players must build strategy, upgraded the existing and developing strong army to go to recapture the zombies were occupied, while players also take precautions, so defense is not lost army of zombies takes up his stronghold. Want to move to a higher level, playing much more attractive screen, players must defeat every army to win back every success in this game screen. Where was the stronghold of zombies took all the players will be losers and have to start that game screen.
- With sophisticated graphic design, brilliant effect increases the players enjoy.
- Sound effects, music on compelling feeling stimulate players, as players more excitement.
- Players can play anywhere with no need to bother that loosen or 3g internet with offline game modes.
- I wish you happy gaming!
Very foundations have been comments of people about the game so that we can improve and develop better games.
